content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (28, 29), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は左上（3,3付近）にいる可能性が高い。こちらの空母は右下（28,29）に配置されており、航空機の射程22でマップ中央〜左上域を索敵可能にするためには、空母をやや北西へ前進させつつ先遣機を発艦して広範囲を探る。まずは空母を安全圏内（敵の初期探索圏外）に留めつつ索敵効率を上げるため、やや北西へ移動して海域を詰める。同時に双方向探索で発見確率を上げるためにBSQ1を北西寄り、BSQ2を北寄りに発艦させる。発見でき次第、その座標へ追加攻撃または回避行動を判断する。空母は敵に発見されないよう視認圏外に留めることを優先。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 25, "y": 26}, "launch_target": {"x": 10, "y": 10}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=10 y=10 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=14 y=13.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "空母を北西へ移動し索敵圏を前進させる。両航空隊を航続範囲内で分散発艦して効率的に左上方面を探索する。まず空母をやや北西へ移動し、BSQ1を北西方向（探索重点）、BSQ2を北方向へ発艦させる。発見次第、攻撃に移行または追加索敵で位置確定する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 25, "y": 26}, "launch_target": {"x": 14, "y": 13}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (14, 13) while at (26, 27).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 28), en route to target (25, 26), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (26, 27), outbound toward (14, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1を左上方面で索敵継続。BSQ2をやや北西寄りに展開して探索範囲を広げ、敵空母を早期発見する。空母は引き続き北西へ移動して航空機の航続距離を活かすが、敵に発見されないよう距離を保つ。BSQ2は空母中心から22以内で左上方向へ発艦。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 24, "y": 24}, "launch_target": {"x": 15, "y": 11}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (15, 11) while at (25, 25).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (26, 26), en route to target (24, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (24, 23), outbound toward (14, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (25, 25), outbound toward (15, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空隊は北西へ順調に進行中。次ターン以降、敵空母発見に備え航空隊の到達経路を注視しつつ、空母をさらに少し前進させ索敵圏を拡大する。ただし過度に接近して敵索敵圏に入らないよう慎重に移動。今回は空母をわずかに北西へ移動しつつ航空隊は現在の索敵を継続させる（発艦指示は不要）。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 23, "y": 23}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=23 y=23 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=24 y=24.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking": "空母の移動先が陸地判定で拒否された。安全に北西へ前進しつつ海域上に留めるため、空母を(24,24)に移動する。航空隊は現在索敵中なので発艦指示不要（null）。到達次第さらに索敵範囲を拡大する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 24, "y": 24}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (24, 25), en route to target (24, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (22, 19), outbound toward (14, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (23, 21), outbound toward (15, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空隊は左上方面へ順調に接近中。空母は安全な海域で北西に寄せ索敵圏を拡大する。敵空母は(3,3)付近の左上にいるので、航空隊到達時に確実に発見できるよう到着予想海域を重点にする。現時点では既に発艦済の2隊に任せ、空母はさらに北西へ移動して次ターン以降の再発艦位置を改善する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 22, "y": 24}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (22, 25), en route to target (22, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (20, 16), outbound toward (14, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (21, 17), outbound toward (15, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両隊が左上へ接近中。敵空母は(3,3)付近のためまだ発見されていない。航空隊が探索エリアに到達するまで空母はやや北西で待機しつつ、次発艦に備えて海域を維持する。敵に発見されないよう視認圏外に留めつつ、航空隊到着後に発見報告が無ければ追加で再発艦するため空母を少し北へ寄せる。今回は空母を安全な海上マス(22,24)へ移動し発艦指示は不要。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 22, "y": 24}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (22, 24), en route to target (22, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (17, 14), outbound toward (14, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (19, 13), outbound toward (15, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両機とも左上方面に到達間近。BSQ1/BSQ2が次ターンで索敵圏に入る可能性が高いので到達して発見が無ければ再度別方向へ投射する準備をする。空母は現在の位置で安全だが、発見後に即応できるよう若干北西へ移動しておく。BSQの発艦は不要（既に発艦中）。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 21, "y": 23}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (11, 10) while at (14, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (14, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (11, 10) (previously at (11, 10)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 23), en route to target (21, 23), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (14, 13), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (16, 11), outbound toward (15, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が敵機を発見した。敵空母は未発見だが、ASQ2の位置(11,10)から敵空母は左上域（近傍）にいる可能性が高い。まず敵機の位置報告を受けて即座に反撃・索敵を継続するため、空母をさらに北西へ移動して航空隊の有効探索範囲を左上に寄せる。帰投中のBSQ1は迎え入れ、BSQ2は現行経路で到達次第周辺を索敵させる。次ターン以降、ASQ2の向きと帰還経路を観察して敵空母位置を推定する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 19, "y": 22}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (15, 11).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (11, 10) (previously at (11, 10)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 23), en route to target (19, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (16, 17), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 11), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両隊が帰投中で再発艦準備中。敵機ASQ2の位置(11,10)が確定しているため、敵空母はその付近（左上端）にいる可能性大。帰投を受けて即座に再発艦し、異なる扇状に展開して敵空母の早期発見を狙う。空母は安全を保ちつつも航空機の射程を最大化するためさらに北西へ移動しておく。次ターン、まずBSQ1をやや北西端（12,10付近）へ、BSQ2をやや北（11,13付近）へ発艦させ探索領域を重複させずカバーする。発見次第攻撃に移行。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 17, "y": 22}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.


Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (11, 10) (previously at (11, 10)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (17, 23), en route to target (17, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (18, 21), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (17, 15), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両機が帰投中で次ターンに再発艦可能。敵航空隊の最後位置(11,10)から敵空母は左上隅付近と推定される。早期発見が勝敗を決めるので、空母は安全圏を維持しつつ航空機の射程を伸ばすためさらに北西へ移動して再発艦拠点を近づける。次にBSQ1をやや西寄りに（敵位置を直接狙う扇状探索）、BSQ2をやや北寄りに発艦し探索エリアを重複させずに広くカバーする。発見したら即攻撃命令へ移行。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 15, "y": 22}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) landed on the carrier while at (17, 23).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (17, 23), en route to target (15, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (17, 19), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1帰還完了。敵空母は左上(11,10付近のASQ2の付近)にいる可能性が高く、早期発見が重要。空母をさらに北西へ接近させて航空機の索敵範囲を最大化するが、陸地に接触しないよう注意。まず空母を(14,22)へ移動して発艦範囲を拡大し、BSQ1を北西寄りの探索点(12,11)へ、BSQ2は補完的にやや北側の(11,13)へ発艦して扇状に探索する。発見次第即攻撃に移る。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 14, "y": 22}, "launch_target": {"x": 12, "y": 11}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) landed on the carrier while at (16, 23).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (12, 11) while at (16, 22).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (16, 23), en route to target (14, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (16, 22), outbound toward (12, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1は左上へ展開中でASQ2の位置（11,10）付近を探索できる見込み。BSQ2を補助索敵として西寄りに発艦させ、発見の確度を上げる。空母は引き続き北西へ接近して索敵半径を伸ばすが、陸地に接触しない安全な海域に留める。発見次第、発見した航空隊を即攻撃に転じさせる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 14, "y": 22}, "launch_target": {"x": 11, "y": 12}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 12 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (11, 12) while at (14, 22).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 23), en route to target (14, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (14, 18), outbound toward (12, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (14, 22), outbound toward (11, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両隊とも敵機ASQ2の位置(11,10)付近へ接近中。到達次第、高確率で敵航空隊や空母を発見できる見込み。空母は現在の海域で発艦拠点として適切なので当面そのまま位置を維持し、着艦待ちのタイミングで即時再発艦できるように準備する。もし到達して発見が無ければ、次に西寄り（さらに左上端）と北寄りの別方向へ再発艦して探索を続ける。今回は航空隊の索敵継続を優先し空母移動は無し。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 13 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 22), en route to target (14, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (12, 14), outbound toward (12, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (12, 18), outbound toward (11, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両隊が敵の最後観測点(11,10)付近へ到達中。到達次第、高確率で敵機または敵空母を発見できる見込み。空母は現在の位置で発艦・着艦を繰り返す拠点として適切なので当面維持する。もし到達して発見がなければ、即座に西寄り（より左上端寄り）と北寄りに再発艦して探索扇を広げ、敵空母の位置を絞る。今回は両機が到達して索敵するため発艦命令は不要。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 14 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (12, 11).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 22), en route to target (14, 22), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (12, 11), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 14), outbound toward (11, 12), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が発見できなかったため帰投中。BSQ2は到達後も発見できなければ再発艦で左上端（より西寄り）を重点的に探す。空母は航空機の航続を最大化するためさらに北西へ接近するが陸地を避け安全距離を保つ。次ターン、着艦したBSQ1とBSQ2をそれぞれ西寄り(9,11)と北寄り(11,13)へ扇状に再発艦して探索を続行する準備をする。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 13, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 15 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (11, 12).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (13, 21), en route to target (13, 21), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (13, 15), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 12), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両隊とも帰投中で、左上端付近の探索で敵空母は未発見。敵は左上（3,3付近）に高確率でいる想定を維持。航空隊を着艦させたらすぐに再発艦して探索扇を西寄り・北寄りに分けてカバーし、発見優先で行動する。空母は陸地を避けつつさらに北西へ接近して航空機の到達範囲を拡大する。まずは着艦待ちのため空母を(11,21)へ移動し、着艦後にBSQ1を西寄り(9,11)、BSQ2をやや北西(10,13)へ再発艦する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 16 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (11, 21), en route to target (11, 21), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 19), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (12, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両隊が帰投中。敵空母は依然左上域（3,3付近）にいる可能性が高い。着艦後は即再発艦して探索範囲を西寄りに広げ、被発見リスクを抑えつつ早期発見を狙う。空母は安全な海域でさらに北西へ接近して航空機の到達距離を最大化するが、陸地に入らないようにする。着艦完了後、BSQ1をより西寄り（9,11）へ、BSQ2を北西寄り（10,13）へ発艦する予定。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 9, "y": 20}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 17 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) landed on the carrier while at (11, 21).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (11, 21), en route to target (9, 20), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 20), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1着艦完了、BSQ2は間もなく着艦。敵空母は左上隅（3,3付近）に高確率で存在する想定のまま。到達可能距離を最大化しつつ敵索敵圏に入らないよう空母を慎重に前進させ、着艦後に両隊を扇状に再発艦して左上隅の最終探索を行う。まず空母をさらに北西へ移動して発艦拠点を整え、BSQ1をより西寄り（9,11）へ、BSQ2をやや北寄り（10,13）へ発艦して重複を避けつつカバーする。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 8, "y": 20}, "launch_target": {"x": 9, "y": 11}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 18 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) landed on the carrier while at (11, 21).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (9, 11) while at (11, 20).  The distance is 9. But unless the enemy carrier is right there, that's too close for reconnaissance. Should point further away.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (11, 21), en route to target (8, 20), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 20), outbound toward (9, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "指摘の通り(9,11)は近すぎる。敵空母は左上隅（3,3付近）に高確率でいるため、索敵はより遠方を狙う必要がある。空母は現在安全に北西寄せ中なので、BSQ1の目標を左上隅方面で遠距離に修正し、同時にBSQ2も広域索敵で西端をカバーする。具体的にはBSQ1を(6,9)へ、BSQ2を(8,10)へ発艦させ扇状に探索し、発見次第即攻撃に移る。空母は現状のまま維持して航空機の帰投拠点を確保する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 6, "y": 9}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 19 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (6, 9) while at (9, 20).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (9, 21), en route to target (8, 20), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (9, 16), outbound toward (9, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (9, 20), outbound toward (6, 9), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両機が左上隅へ向かっており、敵空母は依然(3,3)付近の可能性が高い。索敵の効果を最大化するため、空母は安全を確保しつつさらに北西へ接近して発艦拠点を改善する。BSQ1は現在目標(9,11)へ向かっているがやや近めなので、到達後も周辺を広く探れるようBSQ1はそのまま進行させる。着艦済のBSQ2は現在航行中で良好。次ターンに到着・帰還した航空隊を迅速に再発艦させるため空母を(7,20)へ移動する。発艦指示は不要（両隊行動中）。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 7, "y": 20}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.
